comments.body:
This is way better than what we have. Thinking more..
How do we deal with the case, where more than one plugin can support an api spec format? In some cases, 
    - A way to register two versions of plugins and ability to move back to older versions for stability reasons in production.
    - We don't want to add another new definition for our volume type in api.spec format

How about adding plugin-type to api-spec? Want to hear your thoughts.
I want to overhaul the API input, but I want to do that as a second set of changes.  This set has been baking for too long as it is.
Comment on ownership of the spec pointer?
